00022 /**
00023  * @file   MmAdjust.cpp
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon Oct 24 09:32:49 2005
00026  * 
00027  * @brief  Class for supplying the mismatch intensity as pm adjustment.
00028  */
00029 
00030 //
00031 #include "chipstream/MmAdjust.h"
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/QuantMethod.h"
00034 //
00035 #include "util/Err.h"

00037 
00038 using namespace std; 
00039 
00040 /** 
00041  * @brief Setup ourselves based on data in the blackboard, specifically the
00042  * the pm/mm pairs.
00043  * 
00044  * @param board - blackboard with various state
00045  */
00046 void MmAdjust::setParameters(PsBoard &board) {
00047   DataStore *info = board.getProbeInfo();
00048   info->getProbePmMm(m_Vec);
00049 }
00050 
00051 /** 
00052  * @brief Constructor that takes the list of probe sets to remember
00053  * the pm/mm pairs.
00054  * 
00055  * @param layout - Annotation of probes on microarray.
00056  */
00057 void MmAdjust::setLayout(ChipLayout &layout) {
00058   m_Vec.resize(layout.getProbeCount());
00059   fill(m_Vec.begin(), m_Vec.end(), -1);
00060   m_Vec = layout.getPmMmVec();
00061 }
00062 
00063 /** 
00064  * Subset of probes that should be loaded into memory representation.
00065  * @param probes - bitmask of probes to be used.
00066  */
00067 void MmAdjust::setProbes(std::vector<bool> &probes) {
00068   // do nothing, probes should be loaded via probeset
00069 }
00070 
00071 /** 
00072  * @brief Given a PM probe intensity, supply the MM probe intensity.
00073  * @param probeIx - Index of probe in cel file data.
00074  * @param chipIx - Microarray or chip index.
00075  * @param iMart - IntensityMart which holds raw data.
00076  * @param iTrans - Vector of transformations that should be performed on raw data.
00077  * @param pmIintensity - Intensity of perfect match probe to be adjusted, may
00078  * be modified from original value depending on adjuster
00079  * @param bgrdAdjust - Background adjustment, if any, recommended (i.e. MM intensity)
00080  */
00081 void MmAdjust::pmAdjustment(int probeIx, int chipIx, 
00082                             const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00083                             float &pmIntensity, float &bgrdAdjust) {
00084   int mmIx = 0;
00085   std::map<int,int>::iterator iter;
00086   if(m_Vec.empty()) 
00087     Err::errAbort("MmAdjust::pmAdjustment() - Appears that chip layout has not been set, no mismatch probes.");
00088   mmIx = m_Vec[probeIx];
00089   if(mmIx == -1) 
00090     Err::errAbort("No MM probe for probe with id: " + Convert::toString(probeIx + 1));
00091   bgrdAdjust = QuantMethod::transformPrimaryData(mmIx, chipIx, iMart, iTrans);
00092 }
